rules_text:
When this creature enters or at the beginning of your upkeep, put a shield counter on a noncreature permanent you control.
This permanent isn't a creature unless you control at least three modified lands. [i](Attached permanents you control and counters are modifications.)[/i]
notes:
Needs_Art

Rank_3
needs noncreature type added

Reason: Just needs a noncreature type on the typeline so that this permanent has traits when it's not a creature.
